provisions.specificProvision: Opportunities to go to a club or room (e.g. library or learning support room) instead of joining peers. General staff monitoring .

A staff overseen club or group social activity which child or young person attends instead of joining peers at least twice a week at lunchtimes. Staff monitoring dedicated to child or young person as one of a small group of children or young people.
A group led by a member of staff with a focus on supporting and modelling positive social interactions. Child or young person attends instead of joining peers every day lunchtime
Total supervision or monitoring during all lunch times, but with a constant focus on maintaining independence and social inclusion where possible. Support should be discrete and from a distance
Staff monitoring dedicated to a child or young person as one of a small group of children or young people

Some supervision or monitoring as part of a group during all break times, but with a constant focus on maintaining independence and social inclusion where possible. Support should be discrete and from a distance
Total supervision or monitoring during all break times, but with a constant focus on maintaining independence and social inclusion where possible. Support should be discrete and from a distance

provisionsType.provisionTypeLabel: support over transitions in current setting (pre-16)

provisions.typeOfProvision: support over transitions in current setting (pre-16)
provisions.specificProvision: Some support over transitions, e.g. allowed to leave early from lessons, coming in early before others, or support to manage separation from familiar staff when arriving at the setting. Discreet supervision of all vulnerable students during unstructured times of the day in settings where there is public access.

provisions.typeOfProvision: support over transitions in current setting (pre-16)
provisions.specificProvision: Additional member of staff support for over 10 minutes, during at least two transitions a day . .

provisions.typeOfProvision: support over transitions in current setting (pre-16)
provisions.specificProvision: Additional member of staff support for over 10 minutes, over at least three transitions a day . .

provisions.typeOfProvision: support over transitions in current setting (pre-16)
provisions.specificProvision: Total supervision over all transitions between lessons and different activities, and at the beginning and end of the day

Some support over transitions, e.g. allowed to leave early from lessons, coming in early before others, or support to manage separation from familiar staff when arriving at the setting. Discreet supervision of all vulnerable students during unstructured times of the day in settings where there is public access.
In an open college setting, staff availability in receptions areas or outside the entrance at least twice a day
In an open college setting, staff availability in receptions areas or outside the entrance at least three times a day
Total supervision over all transitions between lessons and different activities and at the beginning and end of the day
